Services Provided

July 29, 2008

Reading time ~1 minute

Here at Linux Dynasty we provide a very cost-effective access to technology. We
are like an IT department in a box: providing Networking, Server/Client
Support, Virtualization, System Automation, Database Design/Administration, Application Programming, Infrastructure Design, Web
Development and Hosting solutions at far less expense than you would pay to
maintain that expertise in house!

 

We provide the following services... 

  • Virtualization
  • System Automation
  • Website Development
  • Application Programming
  • Database Design/Administration
  • Network Infrastructure Design and Implementation 
  • Monitoring of your website or of your complete Infrastructure
  • Deploy/Maintain your favorite Operation System; Linux/Solaris/BSD or Windows
  • Design and Maintain Enterprise to Small Office Email/Collaboration systems.

 

We have over 20 Years combined in the IT industry. Our expertise spans a wide range of industries. Such as ...

  • Top Tier Banks
  • Insurance Companies
  • Social Web Sites
  • Top Media/Advertisement Companies
